title: Help to ID this sans font like DIN / Trade Gothic?
content:
Please help me identify this font. I see it a lot - tried Identifont without luck - distinctive high bar on the G. Thought it might be DIN or Univers but no. Thought maybe Trade Gothic but that's got a spur on the G. Help!

Thanks! Pete

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [everlea.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100603040319/http:/typophile.com/files/everlea.jpg) | 93.04 KB |
author: skypete

comments.content: A badly spaced Trade Gothic LT Std Bold Condensed No. 20?
Unfortunately not. I checked Trade Gothic. See the other words bottom of the graphic has "MESSAGE US" - the G has no spur and a very high bar.

Itâ€™s similar to [Bebas](http://web.archive.org/web/20100603040319/http:/www.dafont.com/bebas.font) and its successor, [Wearetrippin Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20100603040319/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/wearetrippin/display/).

Thanks Akira - I think you're right.

Wonderful! Cheers

Pete
